title: S3 Ep197: Housewives Heavy: Thursday, December 3rd, 2020
itunes:title: Housewives Heavy: Thursday, December 3rd, 2020
description:
• RHOC's Braunwyn Windham-Burke Comes Out as a Lesbian - but Says She's Still Married to Her Husband (PEOPLE)
  • 'RHOBH' Kyle, Kathy & Dorit All Have Covid (TMZ), Erika & Tom Girardi Sued for Allegedly Using Divorce to Embezzle Money to Fund 'Lavish' Lifestyle (PEOPLE)
  • Chrishell Stause gets cozy with 'Dancing with the Stars' pro Keo Motsepe (Page Six)
  • Kardashian-Jenner women pull hilarious FaceTime prank
  • Salesforce buys Slack in a $27.7 B megadeal (Tech Crunch)
